text: When Irish eyes are smiling... A few days after St. Patrick's Day, Roma Downey caught up with E! News'Jason Kennedy at Rock & Reilly's Irish pub to discuss her new book,...... The lights have dimmed a little... Music legend and actress Della Reese passed away at the age of 86 in her home in Encino, Calif., on Sunday night. Many knew that Reese... The actress remembers the late Miss Reese and reflects on how she treated everyone on the hit CBS series. Plus, find out why Della had an early call time to set....... Singer, actress and ordained minister Della Reese died Sunday evening at the age of 86, surrounded by friends and family in her California residence, according to a report
